dt: {bc}any of various composite plants (genus {it}Chrysanthemum{/it}) including weeds, ornamentals grown for their brightly colored often double flower heads, and others important as sources of medicinals and insecticides
{bc}a flower head of an ornamental chrysanthemum

et: borrowed from New Latin, genus name, going back to Latin {it}chrȳsanthemon, chrȳsanthemum{/it} "a yellow-flowered composite plant," borrowed from Greek {it}chrȳsánthemon{/it} "any of various plants with bright yellow flowers," from {it}chrȳsós{/it} "gold" + {it}ánthemon{/it} "blossom, flower" {ma}{mat|chryso-|}, {mat|anthemion|}{/ma}
shortdef: any of various composite plants (genus Chrysanthemum) including weeds, ornamentals grown for their brightly colored often double flower heads, and others important as sources of medicinals and insecticides
a flower head of an ornamental chrysanthemum
